text: Agusta is an Italian helicopter and engine builder. It was founded by Giovanni Agusta in 1929. Its headquarter is in Samarate, Italy. In 2000, it merged with the company Westland to create the now famous AgustaWestland. == Engines == * Agusta GA.70 * Agusta GA.140 == Helicopters == * A.101 * A.103 * A.104 Helicar * A.105 * A.106 * A109/AW109 * A.115 * AW119 Koala * A129 Mangusta * EMA 124 Category:Manufacturing companies Category:Companies of Italy by industry
title: Agusta
